class FocalLoss[source]

FocalLoss(alpha=0.25, gamma=2, reduction='none', pos_weight=None) :: Module

Focal Loss
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class FocalLossFlat[source]

FocalLossFlat(thresh=0.5, axis=-1, floatify=True, alpha=0.25, gamma=2.0, reduction='none', pos_weight=None, flatten=True, is_2d=True) :: BaseLoss

Same as `loss_cls`, but flattens input and target.
{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
batch_size = 64
vocab_size = 10
pos_weight = torch.ones(vocab_size)

yb, preds = torch.rand(64,vocab_size), torch.rand(64,vocab_size)

focal_loss     = FocalLoss(pos_weight=pos_weight)
focal_loss_BCE = FocalLoss(alpha=1, gamma=0, pos_weight=pos_weight)
BCEloss    = nn.BCEWithLogitsLoss(reduction='mean', pos_weight=pos_weight)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
focal_loss(yb,preds)

tensor(0.0505)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
assert focal_loss_BCE(yb,preds) == BCEloss(yb,preds)
